projects.title: OpenSurvey
projects.description: A platform where people can create surveys/polls for others to answer. Completely anonymous, no account required for anyone (even survey creators).

projects.title: Teach A Machine
projects.description: A tool that allows anyone to create a Machine Learning model that can classify anything they want.

projects.title: Rent VS Buy
projects.description: A tool that helps break down the costs of the Rent vs Buy a home decision.

projects.title: MLB Stats
projects.description: A website where you can view all MLB teams, players, and their stats. Build with React and the freely availble MLB API.

projects.title: Master Password
projects.description: A cross browser extension based on the Master Password algorithm by Maarten Billemont. This is a stateless password manager and therefore requires no storage, database, or internet connection.

projects.title: Adclipse
projects.description: A perceptual adblocker Chromium extension that blocks ads using Machine Learning and OCR. Won Best Overall Project in my final year Capstone course at Western University.
